agents.agent_description: Uses technical indicators and historical patterns to make conservative market predictions.
Focuses on real-time sentiment and speculative signals to make aggressive forecasts.
Executes buy/sell orders based on strategies provided by analysis agents.

Monitors exposure, adjusts stop-loss limits, and prevents excessive losses.
